name: Robo: Through the Factory
description:
Play as a robot named Robo as he makes his way through the  seemingly abandoned factory to get to his new legs. He doesn't have the ability to walk, only jump. Collide with enemies to defeat them, except for the enemy with spikes around it.

You will need to  maximize the game to play it in the browser. Also, the quit button only functions in the downloadable version.

Controls

Click and drag to jump  

This will possibly be the first game in the Robo series. This may or may not become a series.

Game By: AmethystGames

(Not affiliated with any company sharing this name or anything similar to it. This was just a username I created. Any coincidence is just that, a coincidence. I will change the name as soon as possible.)
